Review Date: 2019/05/13
Store: EVE'S
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': "EVE'S", 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Contour, For Foundation, For Highlighting', 'Material': 'Wood', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Handle Material': 'Wood', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 3.7 x 1.34 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '782290927471'}
Review Text: This brush is very soft but it doesn't work as well as I expected it to.

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nude Gel Polish 6 Colors Gel Nail Polish Set with Gift Box, Soak Off UV LED Gel Polish Kit
Review Date: 2019/10/22
Store: FULLSEXY
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'FULLSEXY', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.62 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 3 x 1 inches; 8.01 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was kind of disappointed in this purchase the polishes aren't very pigmented so I had to do 4 coats to get it to really show the way I wanted it to and having to do that many coats uses up a LOT of the product so it isn't very cost effective not to mention very time consuming because after each coat you have to cure them under the lamp so it takes up a lot of your time
Review Title: Not very cost effective.
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Makeup Brush Mini 4 in 1 Kit for Travel Cosmetic Applicator Foundation Sponges Brushes Valentine's Day Gift, Blending Eyeshadow Concealer Eyeliner Eyebrow
Review Date: 2019/12/31
Store: Seencool
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Seencool', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Color': 'Golden', 'Material': 'Latex', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.6 x 1.1 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '783710114471'}
Review Text: I really like this mini brush kit it saves me from having to take all my other brushes because it has all the brushes I need in this easy to pack set so instead of having to take a handful of other brushes I can just throw this in my bag it saves space in my bag and I don't have to hunt for a different brush because it is all right there
Review Title: Saves space
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Youluv Under Eye Patches - Collagen Eye Mask Gel
Review Date: 2020/01/12
Store: YOULUV
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '7 x 3.2 x 1.15 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'YL', 'UPC': '790492337899'}
Review Text: These under eye patches don't work very well they don't stay on and honestly they really didn't do anything for my under eyes and when me and my daughter did our facials she said it didn't do anything for hers either so not a very good product
Review Title: Doesn't really do anything and doesn't stay on
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Shower caps reusable for women's, waterproof turban shower caps, suitable for shower ，long hair shower cap & jumbo braid hair cap
Review Date: 2020/07/02
Store: SHAWNTOO
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SHAWNTOO', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.69 x 3.54 x 0.71 inches', 'Inner Material': 'EVA foam', 'Product Dimensions': '6.69 x 3.54 x 0.71 inches; 4.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: Very disappointed in shower cap i tried it out because I had just had my hair done and had to go out so didn't want it messed up and it ended up getting messed up anyway because the cap isn't completely waterproof it leaked and ruined my hair I was really hopeful it would work because of how tight it was and it wasn't very stretchy so I thought they made it that way to prevent leaking but obviously that wasn't the case so it leaked plus it wasn't very comfortable
Review Title: it leaks
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2 Pieces Satin Lined Sleep Caps Hair Cover Bonnets Silk Lined Slouchy Beanies Sleeping Caps for Night Sleeping (Royal Blue, Purple,25 cm)
Review Date: 2021/02/08
Store: Geyoga
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '10.35 x 9.76 x 0.71 inches; 2.08 Ounces'}
Review Text: These sleep caps work really well if you don't want your hair to get messed up while you sleep. I am so glad that now I can put my hair in a braid and it doesn't get messed up at all while I sleep
Review Title: Keeps hair looking good
Rating: 5.0

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed satisfaction with a travel-friendly mini brush kit that effectively saves space and provides convenient access to essential tools. Additionally, the satin-lined sleep caps have been praised for maintaining hair quality overnight, allowing the user to braid hair without issues. The soft bristles of the blending brush were appreciated, indicating preference for comfort in makeup application.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Several products fell short of expectations, leading to disappointment. The makeup brush cleaner required frequent washing to remain effective, rendering it inconvenient. The gel nail polish was criticized for a lack of pigmentation, making it time-consuming and wasteful to apply multiple coats. The under-eye patches did not adhere well and were deemed ineffective, while the shower cap failed to provide proper waterproofing, resulting in hair damage.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user showcases a blend of positive and negative experiences across their purchases. They enjoyed the convenience of a compact makeup brush kit and the effectiveness of satin-lined sleep caps in protecting their hairstyle. However, they faced dissatisfaction with multiple items, including a brush cleaner that lacked durability, nail polish that was not cost-effective, ineffective under-eye patches, and a waterproof shower cap that disappointed in functionality. Overall, the user's shopping behavior highlights a quest for functionality and efficiency, with a mix of successful and unsuccessful products.

target_interaction.title: Doesn't work well
target_interaction.text: I was very disappointed with this purchase because it doesn't work very well and the quality of the materials it is made of was not very good.
